She studied teather in Tehran, and started her professional life with making short movies. She made her first movie when she was only eighteen. She became very popular shortly after her first work in Iranian public TV. She was well known in Iran for her role in the popular [[Iran]]ian [[soap opera]] ''[[Narges]]'', as a [[pious]] young woman.
â
